metadata.title: CVE-2021-30002 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.11.3 when a webcamdevice exists. video_usercopy in drivers/media/v4l2-core/v4l2-ioctl.c has amemory leak for large arguments, aka CID-fb18802a338b.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-30002` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 5.15.0-25.25
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 5.15.0-25.25
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 5.15.0-25.25
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-aws - 5.15.0-1004.6
No subscription required
